___mem.description: Memory (MB) to allocate to each linkerd task.

___admin-port.description: Admin port. Provides an administrative UI for this instance.

___resource-roles.description: The accepted resource roles (e.g. slave_public). By default, this will deploy to any agents with the "*" or "slave_public" roles.

___cpus.description: CPU shares to allocate to each linkerd instance.
